actions.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 359 - 59 (Roll no. 79).

description: Amendment revises the distribution of refugee targeted assistance funds.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 18 in House Report 104-483, to ensure that all qualifying counties in the U.S. would receive the same amount of target refugee assistance per refugee, execpt for the Targeted Assistance Ten Percent Discretionary Program.
